snippet.title: Dodgy Rocks - Trailer
snippet.description:
Crazy high-speed endless thing-dodging in an 8-bit arcade style. You'll just have to have one more try!

Dodge, dodge, dodge, dodge and ... uh ... dodge!

Dodge the rocks and other projectiles coming your way for as long as possible. Dodge, dash, kick and smash your way out of tight spots to survive just one more wave. Are you ready for NIGHTMARE? We don't think you are.

How dodgy can you get?

Features

    Four difficulty levels to suit all abilities
    Secret mechanics to discover and master
    Global online high-score table for the best dodgers

More Information:

https://nivrig.itch.io/dodgy-rocks

https://nivrig.com/game/dodgyrocks.html
